response.overview: Can orthodox religious people survive and live together without killing each other if their children marry? Susan is Jewish, age 22 and comes from NYC. Amman is Muslim, age 23 and comes from Damascus, Syria. Susan and Amman are students who meet at University in NYC. They fall in love and are on a collision course to marry. Exciting confrontations, battles, and clashes erupt. Their parents are against the marriage and refuse to come to the wedding. Lots of trouble, conflict, and obstacles are in their path. Will they survive and live together without killing each other?
response.title: Worlds on Fire
